document_data.name: Brain Food
document_data.mainbody: '''Brain Food''' was an eatery in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was one in a chain of eateries and was primarily, infamously, known for being ran by a [[mindflayer]].{{Cite web/Volo Breaks a Hot Tale (Part One)}}
document_data.Location: This eatery stood along [[Ship Street (Waterdeep)|Ship Street]], next to the festhall [[Velvet Tentacles]], in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] district of Waterdeep.
document_data.Services: Brain Food was primarily known for serving [[fish ball]]s.
